MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH47 postcode area of Whitburn, affecting properties in West Main Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of it and only became aware of this at 11.42AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12.55PM on 13 February 2021.
